Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Timolol ( but not pilocarpine ) was detected in a sample of plasma removed during surgery ; the plasma concentration of timolol ( 2 . 6 ng ml - 1 ) was consistent with partial beta - adrenoceptor blockade .

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| partial beta-adrenoceptor blockade |

Explanation: The only term in the paragraph that clearly refers to a disease is "partial beta-adrenoceptor blockade". Timolol and pilocarpine are drugs, not diseases.

After re-evaluating the paragraph, I realized that "pilocarpine" does not appear in the sample of plasma, but is only mentioned in contrast to Timolol. Therefore, the only valid chemical entity in this paragraph is "Timolol".
